channel.title: New Mic, Same Problem
channel.description:
For christmas I got a brand new microphone for my computer, I got this as my old mic had lots of noise when I was talking. When I plugged my new mic in, i got the same problem. Is their any reason for this or is it just argos selling shitty mics?
ps. My old mic was fine for about 5 months, but then turned shitty.

item.title: New Mic, Same Problem
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Yeah, I’m thinking it’s something to do with your PC now.

Read full topic

item.title: New Mic, Same Problem

item.description:
https://reviews.argos.co.uk/1493-en_gb/313226/category.htm
It looks like they get decent reviews… Maybe your sound card just semi-died (after five months)?
